ValidationRule.description: If the case is approved or rejected, the status cannot be changed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status), OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "Process Concluded"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "Request Denied") ), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'COMM_AffiliateRequest', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'COMM_PartnerRequest' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When the Case is in Process Concluded or Request Denied status, you cannot change the status
